meanings.definition: A person who designs, builds, or works with robots.
meanings.sent1: The talented roboticist created a helpful robot to assist with household chores.
meanings.sent2: The roboticist was busy in the workshop, assembling a new robotic arm.
meanings.sent3: The roboticist accidentally programmed the robot to dance uncontrollably, much to everyone's amusement.
meanings.sent4: Watching the roboticist at work was like observing a wizard casting spells on metal and wires.
meanings.sent5: The young roboticist dreamed of building a robot that could explore outer space.
